body: OK, so for those of you who don't know, my new account/alt is ravingpixelz (name by Zed) but, whenever I attempt to logon to the forums, it says 'incorrect username and password combination' I'm 100% sure I got them right and I've tried changing my password numerous times. Any help? Is it a bug?

replies.body:
Can you explain your problem in more detail? As of now, I'm confused what you're trying to do. 
So... you're trying to use your SnakeV3nom10 password to log into your other account? 
Or have you tried to give your new account the username and password the normal way....?
I'm not so sure about this... cause I'm not like the tech person, but I think you should try... doing the normal way again? I guess...? 
I'm just sort of confused right now. 

PS: Don't start being desperate three minutes after your post. People don't immediately respond to your post in three minutes. xD
